name: webmap-kmz
description: Testing loading KMZ files on a LeafletJS web map.

scripts.start: npm run client:build && cd webserver && npm start
scripts.install: (cd client && npm install) && (cd .. && cd webserver && npm install) && (cd .. && cd webserver-kmz && npm install)
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:fix --prefix ./client && npm run kmz:server:lint && npm run webserver:lint
scripts.lint:fix:all: npm run lint:fix --prefix ./client && npm run kmz:server:lint:fix && npm run webserver:lint:fix

author: ciatph
